name: Unpressed: A Story about Life
description:
Unpressed is a story about how any of us can be affected by the world and people around us, it can hurt us, make us happy, create laughter and enjoy ourselves.

In Unpressed you play the role of a man trying to make a mark on the world, to make himself happy and deal with all the problems he faces, you must make choices for him that may or may not affect the experience he has.

I hope this game will take you on a journey into how many people see the world.

Unpressed is still in development and not in a complete game state right now. As and when more information is available this page will be updated.

I'll be adding progress as often as I can when I'm too tired to work on the game.
